Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells expressing wild-type and mutant LRRK2/PINK1.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased phosphorylation of α-synuclein in LRRK2-G2051D-expressing cells.
Reduced mitochondrial membrane potential in PINK1-G235D-expressing cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2/PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation levels within 10% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation levels exceeding 30% of wild-type controls or mitochondrial membrane potential < 50% of controls.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells expressing PINK1 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Mitochondrial membrane potential reduced by 40% in PINK1-G235D-expressing cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial membrane potential ≥ 80% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial membrane potential < 50% of wild-type controls.
